contextId.information: These are like beans, but their seeds are very small, round, and somewhat flat. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])
a strong, smooth cloth made from a plant. It is worn by many people in places that are hot. AT: "smooth cloth" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])
A dark gold-colored metal. It is made from mostly copper with tin added for strength. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])

a strong, smooth cloth made from a plant. It is worn by many people in places that are hot. See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:ezk:09:01|9:2]]. AT: "smooth cloth" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])

a strong, smooth cloth made from a plant. It is worn by many people in places that are hot. See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:ezk:09:01|9:2]]. AT: "smooth cloth" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])
This is a type of spice that comes from the bark of a tree. "Cassia" is another name for this spice. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])
These are all precious stones of different colors. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])
contextId.quote: ruby, topaz, emerald, chrysolite, onyx, jasper, sapphire, turquoise, and beryl
